items.title: Web Integration Diploma
items.subtitle: OpenClassrooms
items.text: Acquired skills through 12 professionally validated web development projects. Training focused on CSS/SCSS, HTML, JavaScript, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and React/Redux.

items.title: Electric Equipment Operation Training
items.subtitle: Auchan
items.text: Training in operating pallet jacks and electric stackers as part of my maintenance and handling responsibilities at Auchan.

items.title: Head of Design
items.subtitle: CreatLinx, London
items.text: Co-founder of a blockchain/cryptocurrency startup. Involved in recruitment, design validation, development, and strategic planning. Demonstrated versatility, adaptability, and creativity.

items.title: Various Roles in the Hospitality Industry
items.subtitle: Huttopia, Columbus, Factory & Co, Strasbourg
items.text: Served as a barista for 2 months, worked as a cook and waiter for 2 years, and performed as an event host and bartender at a campsite during the seasonal period.

items.title: Versatile Employee
items.subtitle: Auchan, Illkirch
items.text: Worked as a multi-skilled employee in a supermarket within the maintenance team. Responsibilities included restocking and maintaining shelves, customer service, inventory management, and training on specialized machinery.

items.title: Music
items.text: Guitar, Piano, Drum Pad, and Digital Audio Workstation (advanced skills in FL Studio and extensive experience with various audio plugins).

items.title: Profile
items.text: Driven by a passion for web development, I have acquired valuable experience in the hospitality and customer service sectors. As a self-taught and quick learner, I am seeking a role that enables me to advance my personal projects while meeting my professional objectives.
Développement de la partie Front-end d'un site web.
Maintenance et tests d'un site web
